title: Addiction
author: Ryan Leslie
https://genius.com/artists/Ryan-leslie
lyrics: [Intro: Ryan Leslie & Fabolous ] R Les, NextSelection Ay, its R Les for prez baby Yea, just rock with me now And I'm his running mate Loso, in case you ain't know so [Verse 1: Ryan Leslie] You've got fashion and style I'm lovin' your smile and The way you get down I can't see no one else It's you by yourself, yea In spite of the crowd (Baby no one else matters) [Pre-Hook: Ryan Leslie] It started off with a kiss (uh huh) Never expectin' this (uh huh) And now I'm here copin' with My addiction (addiction) It started off with a kiss (uh huh) Never expectin' this (uh huh) And now I'm here copin' with My addiction While all the girls say [Hook: Cassie] I'm addicted to you I'm addicted to you I'm addicted to you You're my addiction I'm addicted to you I'm addicted to you I'm addicted to you You're my addiction [Post-Hook: Ryan Leslie] When I'm lookin' in the mirror Honey, you are all I see And it could not be no clearer That I need you here with me [Verse 2: Ryan Leslie] I was hopin' you'd notice The way that I like to Have you around Listen and you will find that Your heart beats for me Girl, I hear the sound (And it only gets better) [Pre-Hook: Ryan Leslie] It started off with a kiss (uh huh) Never expectin' this (uh huh) And now I'm here copin' with My addiction (addiction) It started off with a kiss (uh huh) Never expectin' this (uh huh) And now I'm here copin' with My addiction While all the girls say [Hook: Cassie] I'm addicted to you I'm addicted to you I'm addicted to you You're my addiction I'm addicted to you I'm addicted to you I'm addicted to you You're my addiction [Verse 3: Fabolous] Ya, now lemme find out I got you Amy Wine'd out (yeah) I get 'em hooked like I threw a fishing line out (gotcha) My white girl keep me Federline'd out (uh uh) I'm too G so I stay Gucci signed out (Gucci) And I get so much attention They sit and talk about me like intervention They say that white Phantom look so cocaine I hop out the suicides lookin' so Kobain And I just Courtney Love when they know your name They like Loso, we already know so damn (damn) They come back one more grams Right back like Lindsay out the program, yeah [Hook: Cassie & Fabolous ] I'm addicted to you ( Addiction ) I'm addicted to you I'm addicted to you You're my addiction ( I got 'em so addicted, baby ) I'm addicted to you I'm addicted to you ( They just keep calling me man ) I'm addicted to you ( I just keep calling 'em , ha ha) You're my addiction [Outro: Fabolous] Yea, R Les for prez like I said Loso is his running mate, man I'm riding with you homie Let's get 'em, yea What's up Street Fam
